description: This trap signifies that the sending protocol
entity recognizes that one of the xDSL communication
links is in a fluctuating state.

event.Summary: xDSL communication link is in fluctuating state

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex
